author: John D. Stoll
title: Storied Ferrari Designer Wants to Build a $2.5 Million Electric CarStoried Ferrari Designer Wants to Build a $2.5 Million Electric Car
text:
Pininfarina SpA has spent nine decades designing Ferraris, Cadillacs, Alfa Romeos and Maseratis. It now plans to build its own electric “hyper car” that only a sliver of the world’s population can afford.
The storied Italian design firm will put a multimillion-dollar car on sale in 2020 as other brands—including Porsche AG and Aston Martin—flock to the electric-vehicle segment.
